name: lab8-ai-services
description: This lab builds directly on Lab 7 (MVC Chat App with CRUD + Persistence) and introduces an AI Service Layer to integrate real large language models (LLMs) like OpenAI, Groq, and OpenRouter while keeping the core app modular, testable, and secure. The project adds a configurable AI provider system and end-to-end testing using Playwright, reflecting real-world software engineering practices.
